items.title: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce wearing Ralph Lauren in engagement photo could prove positive catalyst for stock, Jefferies says
items.description: One analyst called the engagement "mission success" for the apparel maker.

items.title: Using options to trade this pharma name that has multiple tailwinds in its favor

items.title: JPMorgan downgrades Krispy Kreme to underweight, says proposed turnaround plan won’t save it from ‘survivor mode’
items.description: JPMorgan said Krispy Kreme may be overestimating its product demand when in reality, its brand novelty has diminished.

items.title: CoreWeave will rally more than 25% from here thanks to AI, says Cantor Fitzgerald
items.description: The investment firm initiated coverage of the cloud computing company at an overweight rating.
